ing.item: Firm bananas; peeled and cut diagonally into 1/2 inch slices
Plus 2 Tbs. dark brown sugar; packed

directions.step:
Prep: 5 min, Cook: 5 min.
Turn on broiler. Arrange banana slices in a buttered baking dish. Sprinkle with brown sugar and cardamom and dot with butter. Broil 2-3 minutes or until top is bubbly. Serve bananas with vanilla yogurt. Posted to recipelu-digest by molony <molony@scsn.net> on Feb 08, 1998
